ingredients: 1 1/2 cups picante sauce, divided (mild, medium or hot)
1 (14 oz) can black beans, rinsed and drained
1 lb ground beef or ground turkey
1 cup shredded pepper jack cheese (or whatever other kind of cheese you like)
Toppings:  sliced avocado, diced tomato, cilantro
